```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  fig.width = 10,
  fig.height = 6,
  out.width = "100%",
  dpi = 300,
  comment = "#>"
```

```{r}
library("tna")
```

```{r}
data("engagement", package = "tna")
```

```{r}
tna_model <- tna(engagement)
print(tna_model)
```

```{r}
plot(tna_model)
```
```{r, warning = FALSE}
cd <- communities(tna_model)
plot(cd, method = "leading_eigen")
```


```{r, figures-side, fig.show="hold", out.width="30%", fig.height=8, fig.width=4}
dyads <- cliques(tna_model, size = 2)
plot(dyads)
```
```{r}
triads <- cliques(tna_model, size = 3)
plot(triads)
```


```{r,}
prune_results <- prune(tna_model, method = "lowest", lowest = 0.4)
plot(prune_results)
```
